thread.title: Man shot multiple times in Roseland
thread.title_full: Man shot multiple times in Roseland | Chicago Sun-Times

title: Man shot multiple times in Roseland
text:
A man was shot multiple times Tuesday morning in the Roseland neighborhood on the Far South Side.
The shooting happened in the 0-100 block of West 112 th Street a few minutes before 8 a.m., police said.
The 24-year-old man was shot in the arm and torso, and was taken to Christ Medical Center in Oak Lawn, where his condition stabilized, police said.
A police source said the victim is a documented gang member.
